version_description: - When you go to the home screen with the "App Lock" setting enabled, the last screen of the app is changed to lock (to cover the current screen).
- Text margins option added. Included in in-app purchases. (iOS 11 and later)

- Improved text file scrolling
- Tap the top of the screen to go to the previous page

- Fixed a bug where the last letter of the text page was not displayed.
- Reward video mute applied
- Adjust the height of the top tab area in the iPhone X vertical position
- Including bug fixes

- Change app icon
- Add FTP help
- Improved symptom that does not appear when repeating long click menu
- Other improvements

- Improved Text Encoding Alert Configuration
- Improved text file scrolling performance
- Improved symptom of not clicking the bottom ad removal button
- Adding license information
- Other improvements

- Fixed some Japanese translation
- Bug fixes and improvements for advertising
- If you add a text file language selection option and the language of the device and the language of the file to read are different, you can set it according to the language of the file.
- Other improvements

- Improved the symptom of displaying only part of the page in some text files
- Improved symptom that goes beyond the bottom in iPhone X landscape mode
- Other bug fixes

- Improved symptoms of app stoppage and dying by coming back from the Import Cloud Files screen
- File deletion success notice not shown
- Add clear button to modify file name field
- Improvement of text wrapping
- The function that the indicator on the lower part of the viewer screen disappears slowly when user's input is not available for a certain time on iPhone X
- Other bug fixes

- When opening a file, information is always displayed at the bottom of the screen. Touch the screen to disappear.
- Improved display of iPhone X text
- First loading improvement
- Other bug fixes

- Fixed a bug where the contents of the file were not changed when a new file was loaded from the last page of the text file.
- Added text underline function
- Improved file open speed for the first time
- Other improvements and bug fixes
- Fixed iOS 12 bug

- Fixed rotation bug
- Fixed a bug where underlines are not shown after watching a reward
- Other improvements

- Fixed the problem that imported files copied from external app can not be imported on some models that have been updated with iOS 12.
- Fixed status bar display bug

- Fixed advertising bug
- Other improvements
- Fixed an app suddenly dying when setting screen on main screen of iPhone X

- Fixed reported bugs
- Improve color picker rotation, change brightness
- An option to display the menu with a double tap is added.
- Add FTP Passive Mode
- Other improvements

- External (Bluetooth) keyboard keys can be changed.
- Added the ability to move the previous page to the left and right tabs. (Default OFF, can be activated in settings.)
- Bug and other improvements
- Symptom improvement patch that sometimes file history is not visible in the subfile list. (If you have the same symptom after updating, please send it to junhuloveapple@gmail.com)

- Improved reported bugs (crashes)
- Improved symptom of freezing file list screen from some users

- Text file font size on iPhone increased to maximum 45 (iOS 11 or later)
- Fixed a bug that did not move when last page moved from last page to tab
- Improved symptom that some folders are not displayed (from the Move / Copy popup)
- Improved not to show their path in folder list (from Move / Copy popup)
- Improved reported bugs (crashes)
- Fixed a bug that does not show some end of text

- Folder can be created in sub-path (except inside compressed file)
- Add dark mode, darken the normal screen background
- Added center tab (menu display) function
- Various ways of menu display on the viewer screen can be changed (Long Tab, Top Tab, Center Tab, Double Tab)
- Other bug fixes

- A scroll bar has been added to the right of the main screen. You can enable it with the "Show scrollbars" option in Settings.
- Other bug fixes
- Fixed the problem that the file contents of subfolders are displayed abnormally.

- Increase text file margin maximum value
- Added automatic text paging method and changeable method in option
- Add rotation button to viewer menu
- Improved symptom of app dying when loading some large text files
- Improved the symptom of app dying when decompressing compressed file containing text file
- Other bugs and improvements

- 이제 자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다. (설정에서 자동회전 또는 잠금이 가능합니다.)
- 회전 시 정확한 페이지를 찾지 못하는 증상을 개선
- 설정 화면 개선
- 구매 복원 개선
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정



앱을 이용해주시고 다양하고 좋은 의견을 보내주셔서 감사합니다.

이번 업데이트는 "자동회전" 기능을 추가했습니다.
2018년 한해 좋은 의견을 보내주셔서 많은 기능이 추가되었습니다.

2019년에도 계속 계선하도록 하겠습니다.
한해 마무리 잘 하시고. 크리스마스도 잘 보내세요.
2019년도 화이팅 !!

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다. (설정에서 자동회전 또는 잠금이 가능합니다.)

- 페이지 전환 속도 개선
- 블루투스 키보드 : 스페이스, 엔터, 백스페이스 키 추가
- 블루투스 키보드 : 뷰어 화면 닫기 엑션 키 수정 가능
- 상단탭 영역을 화면 높이의 3분의 1 조정
- 페이지 수가 적은 텍스트 파일에서의 버그 수정


앱을 이용해주시고 다양하고 좋은 의견을 보내주셔서 감사합니다.

2018년 한해 좋은 의견을 보내주셔서 많은 기능이 추가되었습니다.

2019년에도 계속 계선하도록 하겠습니다.
한해 마무리 잘 하시고 새해 복 많으 받으세요.
2019년도 화이팅 !!

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 회전 시 로딩 속도를 대폭 개선했습니다.
- 북마크 제목
- 북마크 편집 기능 : 위치 변경
- 일부 폰트 크기에서 글자 일부가 표시가 되지 않는 증상 개선 (폰트 크기를 변경해서 다시 로드하면 수정됩니다.)
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 텍스트 페이지 표시 버그 수정

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 스크롤/탭 중에 회전 안되도록 개선
- 북마크 편집 중에 셀을 클릭하면 타이틀 변경이 가능
- 개선 및 버그 수정

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 자동 회전 시 간혹 먼 페이지로 이동하는 버그 수정
- 아이폰 X (노치 디자인 기기) 에서 가로 회전 UI 버그 수정
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 한글 줄 바꿈 개선
- 버그 수정 및 기능 개선

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 볼륨을 변경하면 다음 페이지로 변환되는 기능추가. (소리 크기도 같이 변경됩니다. 주의하세요. 인앱구매 또는 리워드 시청 필요.)
- 텍스트 파일 빈줄 처리 옵션을 추가 (문장 마지막에 빈줄)
- FTP 숨김파일이 표시되지 않습니다.
- 클립보드에 복사한 내용을 txt 파일로 변환할 수 있습니다.
- 텍스트 페이지의 첫 문장이 들여쓰기가 되지 않는 증상 개선
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 자동스크롤을 개선하고 최저속도 변경
- 하위 폴더에서 클라우드 파일 멀티 선택되지 않는 증상 수정
- 구매 복원에 설명 추가 (기기변경, 기기초기화)
- 패드에서 텍스트 두페이지 설정 후, 이미지/PDF 자동 스크롤에서 팝업이 등장하는 버그 수정
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

자동 회전 기능이 추가 되었습니다. 기기의 회전 방향에 따라서 뷰어 화면도 회전이 가능합니다.

- 한글이 깨지는(이상한 글자로 표시되는) 몇 개의 텍스트 파일을 발견해서 해결
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

자동 회전, 볼륨 기능 등 추가 (자세한 내용은 앱 설명 참고)

- 일부 기기에서 텍스트 파일 읽는 중에 크래시가 발생하는 증상 개선

- iOS 10 에서 폰트크기, 폰트간격, 좌우여백 팝업 개선
- iOS 10 에서 들여쓰기, 밑줄 투명 기능 지원
- iOS 10 에서 자동 스크롤(페이지 넘김) 기능이 동작하지 않던 버그 수정
- iOS 10 에서 텍스트 파일 뷰어 화면에서 로딩과 화면 전환이 느린 증상 개선
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

- 내용 중 일부를 분실한(파손된) 텍스트파일 인코딩 문제 개선 (이상한 글자로 표시되는 증상)
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

- 야간 모드 단축 버튼 추가 (뷰어화면 중앙탭 메뉴)
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

- 텍스트 파일 랜더링 개선
- 기타 기능 개선 및 버그 수정

- 스크롤 시 다음 페이지 등장 속도 증가 (깜빡이는 증상 개선)
- 탭으로 페이지 전환 시, 애니메이션 효과 없음 상태에서 깜빡이는 증상 개선

- Paper texture background added. (Update users are enabled in the settings, the first install user is the default activation status.)
- Improve speed when converting font / line feed information
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Simplify options to switch to previous page with tabs
- Changed the previous page transition options so that only one of top, left, or right can be selected
- Adjust the position of options in the settings
- Added free ad removal termination reminder
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed single-tab (next page) related bug
- Improved the symptom that the set animation effect does not apply when switching the next page of Bluetooth keyboard
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Improved the symptom of moving to the first page when touching the status bar
- Improved various crashes reported.
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Ability to change page orientation (swipe direction) and add options
- If you change the orientation of two pages on the iPad, the page orientation changes as well.
- Added shortcut button to modify screen brightness
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Text line wrapping function Initial value change (first install user)
- Fixed the problem that the drag function does not work when the "Single tab (next page)" option is turned OFF.
- Improved downloading of cloud app files (importing files)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- iCloud sync function added, change from setting to ON (iOS 11+)
- Synchronize the information (read location) of the file you read and open the same file on another device (logged into the same iCloud account) to view it again.
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Improved delays when switching between tabs
- If there is delay after updating, please disable the double tap item in the setting.
- Double tap related function not supported (menu display, zoom in, previous page change)
- Double tap related function not supported: It can be used before inactive if it is used already
- Other improvements

- The current time and the read time are displayed at the top of the menu screen. (In-app purchase, reward)
- "Status bar not displayed", "Notched design device horizontal rotation status" is displayed.
- "Unused" is added to the "Switch to next book" option.
- "Next Book Switch" - "Not Used": The guide screen and list screen shown on the last page are not displayed.
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Fixed bug that font screen is not displayed in some versions of iOS.
- If you are currently pausing or delaying loading on some versions of iOS, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo".

- Added the ability to play sound effects if you change the page transition animation to "Page Curl" (in-app purchases, rewards)
- If the current version of iOS stops or slows down on the loading screen, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo". (13)

- Improvement: The two-page option of the iPad text can also be changed in the options on the viewer screen.
- If the current version of iOS stops or slows down on the loading screen, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo". (no symptoms on iOS 12)
- Urgent: Improved the symptom of scrolling app dying in setting screen at the bottom right of main screen

- Added two page view function only in landscape mode: It is a function that switches to one page mode when it rotates vertically in two page mode in horizontal rotation. (IPad only)
- You can change the double tap function again in Settings.
- If the current version of iOS stops or slows down on the loading screen, please change to the default font "Apple SD Gothic Neo". (no symptoms on iOS 12)

- RGB change function is added to color change.
- Drag the RGB color left or right or enter the number directly
- Change existing method and RGB change method to upper tab
- Improved the problem that background music can not be played while using the page turning sound.

- Fixed app dying when entering trash screen in certain OS version
- Fixed other bugs

-UI of the viewer screen (upper / lower bar and button) is always applied in dark mode (not displaying sky color, except background color)
-Fixed a bug that the bottom bar color is not reversed in full mode
- Fixed an issue where two pages would see the same content after returning from using another app in two page mode

- App display in "File"-"My iPhone (iPad)"
- Fixed bug that popup won't show up when downloading files from cloud app
- "My iPhone (iPad)" Sync: Some existing files / folders may not be displayed (on my iPhone (iPad) screen). Clearing and reinstalling the app will improve it.
- When you go to the home screen with the "App Lock" setting enabled, the last screen of the app is changed to lock (to cover the current screen).

- Improved the symptom of no file transfer when sharing file with other apps
- File sharing doesn't arrive when sharing files from other apps
- Added file sorting option. (Date modified, file size, progress)

- Added option and function to lock the rotation of all screens (iPhone app: portrait only, iPad app: both landscape and portrait)
- Font-line spacing improvement

-Improved text file scrolling (old devices)
-Automatic button position correction on 4.0 inch phones

- When installing for the first time, the symptom of not displaying the guide text on the main screen
- Increased cloud app download timeout time
- Other improvements and bug fixes

-In iOS 13 and later, changing the status bar text color is not supported. (API disabled)
-On iOS 13 or later iPhone devices, the status bar is not displayed when rotating horizontally. At the top of the long-click menu, time and battery are displayed. (Same processing as the current Notch Design iPhone)
-Improved other iOS 13 issues
-Other bug fixes and improvements

- "Recent List" and "File List" of main screen are separated.
- Both screens can be switched by swipe horizontally.
- Menu design of the viewer screen is changed.
- The change to the main screen removes the "Show recent files" option.
- Fixed a problem that can not download files from Mega Cloud
- Fixed anomalies at the top of the screen when running on the Notch Design
- Other improvements and bug fixes
- Fixed app crash when switching text file "split file" screen on iOS 13 update device

- Re-enabled "Show recent files" option in Settings.
- If the "Show recent files" option is turned OFF, only the file list screen is displayed without displaying the latest list screen. (main screen)
- Fixed the problem that the custom scroll bar is displayed on the right side of the recent list
- Fixed a problem that can not be changed when changing the dark mode after downloading a file from the cloud app (iOS 13)

- iOS 13 update improves crash on some devices
- Fixed the problem that the Recycle Bin screen does not apply to dark mode
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Added a function to delete only the item without deleting the original file from the recent list list (can be deleted from the right menu)
- Fixed the problem that the close search button is changed when the file is returned after executing the search
- Improved to show app reinstallation or device reset message if purchase history is reset frequently
- Crash improvements on some devices in iOS 13
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Improved reported crash on some devices since iOS 13
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Improved the symptom of app death when configuring files after app restart if registered through “Default font” of font list screen after adding external font file
- Change setting and sorting icon at the bottom of file list
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Imported font files (TTF, OTF) through "Cloud App"
- Add font file (TTF, OTF) file through "Open in other app" item in external app
- Folder check function added (file list screen)
- Improved to open the last viewed file regardless of the status of the recent file view option

- Apple pencil (2nd generation ~) double tap to add the next page switch (in-app purchase, iPad only, iOS 12.1 or later)
- Adjust the brightness of text and icons when setting the dark mode
- Change and improvement of time check API of automatic cache clearing
- Correct description text on desktop during first installation
- Added help function at the top left of the cloud app screen

- API improvements for text file conversion
- Fixed an issue where some ads remained at the bottom of the main screen after removing ads on some notch design devices

- Swipe (drag) direction change also changes the direction of page movement of the left and right arrow keys on the Bluetooth keyboard.
- Added a popup to display a guide when changing to some setting options

- Add cloud app connection failure message popup
- Improved display of ads at the bottom of the file list screen
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Now supports multitasking on iPad
- Support for multi-tasking feature that doesn't support screen rotation fixed on iPad
- Added page initialization function = Initializes the page position the next time the file is opened again if it has progressed beyond the set progress
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed the problem that the screen does not go down during cloud app function
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Improved scroll performance on iPad
- Added app language setting function independent of device language setting (including in-app purchase)
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- "Swipe Back" function added (rewards, in-app purchase) , iOS 13+, Initial setting OFF, can be changed in setting
- Other improvements

- Fixed crash issue related to Apple Pencil support
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Close screen with swipe: Added "Apply-2" option that works only when the menu is displayed on the viewer screen. , Reduce malfunctions with page switching behavior.
- Fixed the problem that the characters at the bottom of some pages of some text files are cut off by improving the left and right margins of the text.

- The status bar is always displayed at the top of the normal screen. (iOS 13+)
- Improved to change the value immediately when changing the screen brightness in the viewer screen menu
- Fixed bug with two pages of text file on iPad
- Add recommended color

- Improved last page screen
- Large / medium size thumbnail UI on recent list screen (iOS 13+)

- Optimize page spacing: Optimize the space between pages when scrolling text files (iPhone Only, iOS13 +)
- "Optimize Page Spacing" can be turned ON / OFF in the setting.
- Even in the "Optimize page spacing" function, some spacing may occur depending on the font and spacing settings.

- Improved page spacing optimization
- Improved performance of "Handle blank lines / Remove line breaks"
- Improved not to repeat encoding when opening a text file (improvement of file open performance)
- Renamed "Center Tab" to "Horizontal Tab" among menu open options
- New "center tab" option to display when tapping the center center of the screen in the menu open function

- Speed up loading text files
- Improved the symptom of dropping when scrolling after changing font information (iPhone)

- Fixed the issue that the bottom characters are truncated on pages of some text files after "optimizing text scrolling"
- Text file scrolling improvements
- "Reward notification" function not provided
- GZ (GZIP) compressed file support

- TTS function support (in-app purchase or reward required, iOS13 +)
- Added full file search function in the main screen (Folder not supported)
- Fixed an issue where ads would reappear after in-app purchase
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Underline spacing option added
- Option to change some of the file information displayed in the file list (no recent list screen)
- Fixed the problem that playback is not possible on a Bluetooth connected device after setting the setting to "Home Control"-"Apply" when playing TTS.
- Fixed the first TTS voice to be selected as normal voice quality (high quality voice needs to be downloaded from home screen settings)

- Added the ability to separate pages on two pages of iPad text, the options are the same as those provided by underscore (iOS 13+)
- Add voice download route in TTS voice selection popup
- Added instructions on how to improve on cloud app download failure popup
- TTS home control function not supported, TTS home control function is not supported due to interference with other functions provided by the app.

- ePub novel support, only text in ePub to display the same (with the same function) as the existing txt file. (No media such as images or audio, no chapter function)
- Fixed the problem that the app sometimes stops or dies on the last page of the TTS function

- "Complex Password" doesn't work on iOS 13+
- After updating, change the "Complex Password" setting to another type and change it back to "Complex Password". After that, it works normally.
- Improved to always display "Restore Purchase History" button at the top of the purchase screen
- Enable indentation option in all languages
- Change blank line option initial value
- Added "sponsor" feature
- Other bug fixes and improvements
- txt file: Added the [Read inheritance] function and option to inherit the information of the existing file if there is a file with the same name when moving / renaming

- When you run the app after the initial installation, change the contents of the pop-up (Guide to restore the purchase history)
- Added a button to change single tap (previous page) option to viewer screen menu
- Improved the overall file search speed on the main screen
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- Text/ePub vertical alignment function added, can be changed in the settings screen at the bottom right of the main screen. (iOS 13+)
- Increase the maximum value of the text/ePub top and bottom margins
- Improved the symptom that the screen is displayed late when copying files from other apps
- Optimization and speed improvement of recent list and file list screen
- Improved symptoms of crash in some ePub files
- Other performance improvements and bug fixes
- Some ePub files could not be opened.

- Added FTP file sorting function and options
- Added the ability to download all files currently visible on the FTP screen
- Display size and modification date information under FTP file name
- Fixed a problem that sometimes the contents are not displayed on the page when returning after running another app
- Fixed the problem that the txt extension (letter) is displayed above the folder icon in the file list
- Fixed the problem that ePub file is not displayed in FTP
- Other function improvements

- Fixed the problem that the app does not run on devices with iOS 10 or lower
- Fixed the problem that the cell is not clicked when clicking the file icon in FTP

- When installing the app for the first time on iOS 12 or lower devices, the initial scrolling option is changed.
- Other error fixes and improvements

- Improved file sorting function
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- Improved text page performance
- Other performance improvements and bug fixes

- FTP: UI / UX change
- OneDrive, WebDav, SMB support (iOS 13 +)
- Other bug fixes
- Fixed the problem that the app dies when an error file is downloaded from Google Drive (API)

- Added "External Document" function (You can import files from other apps, + iOS13)
- Added a button to change scrolling and paging on the auto scroll pause menu screen
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- Fixed an issue that external keyboard input was not input normally on devices with iOS 13.4 or later (Emergency)
- Add notification message when inbox folder deletion fails

- Improved SMB function
- Fixed the problem that the screen freezes during the process of downloading all files in WebDav
- Other function improvements and bug fixes

- ZIP library error improvement (fix)
- Improved Google Drive (API) file download
- Depending on the Wi-Fi connection status and file size, the "Download all files" function in the cloud / server may be limited.
- Improvements and bug fixes

- Folder lock function added
- Application of download progress UI (some cloud / server)
- Other function improvements

- Webdav access method improvement
- Added txt/ePub text alignment "Justify" function and options
- Easy address input on the WIFI upload screen
- Fixed a problem that is not displayed in the file sharing app list

- TTS play time (auto shutdown) function added: Plays for a set time and then automatically ends.
- Fixed an issue where in-app purchases are released when the lock state is released after a certain time on the viewer screen of the iPad
- Other function improvements

- Fixed an issue where in-app purchase (or reward) was sometimes resolved on the viewer screen
- Fixed file sharing bug in other apps

- Improved rendering of txt files
- Fixed the problem that some functions are disabled after changing the iPad multitasking status
- Fixed in-app purchase/reward function related errors

- Added all cache delete function
- Other function improvements

- Changed the background color of the pop-up to gray to make it less glare in dark mode.
- Other function improvements

- Added txt file merge function (included in in-app purchase, iOS 13+)
- Changed the background of the loading alot to a darker color with DarkGray (setting popup remains normal gray)
- When running the app for the first time, the background color is changed to a dark color for less glare.

- Improved the symptom that the status bar text was not clearly visible due to the content in the viewer screen menu (iOS 13+)
- When a file is checked in the sub-file list, the file is not opened and checked.

- Changed the name of the option to close the screen by swiping
- Other function improvements

- One-way movement function and option added (in-app purchase required)
- Improved function to clear all caches

- Added a menu display function by long clicking on the main/sub screen of the file list (iOS 13+), it does not work in the internal list of compressed files.
- Improved the symptom that the content is hidden on the keyboard when searching in the file list
- Improved scroll bar display of file list

- When switching to the previous page, some of the contents of the next page are displayed at the bottom.
- Other function improvements
- Added option and function to change the sorting method (rules) by name (iOS 13+)

- Displays folders of all paths that can be moved when copying/moving files (iOS 13+)
- Fixed a symptom that the app dies in some situations when switching to the previous page

- Fixed a problem where folders in some paths were not displayed when copying/moving files
- Fixed a symptom that the screen was not updated when the screen was switched back after switching the recent list screen while searching on the main screen
- Improved the symptom that the record of reading files is sometimes not saved on some devices

- Added "Move/Copy Files" option to change the folder/path display method in Copy/Move Files
- One drive automatic login
- Other function improvements

- Supports'Quick View' function, it is a function to open files immediately after downloading from GoogleDrive/Dropbox/OneDrive/Webdav/SMB. (iOS 14+)
- Added a thumbnail type that displays all files in the group in the recent list (iOS 14+)
- Other function improvements

- Added a function to stop playback if the AirPod is removed during TTS playback
- Added features and options that do not appear in the recent list when a certain progress rate is exceeded (iOS 14+)
- Change the minimum supported OS version from 10.0 to 11.0
- Fixed crash reported on main screen

- Fixed and improved crashes reported on viewer screen, cloud screen, etc.
- Fixed a symptom that scroll bar was displayed on the recent list screen
- Fixed a problem where a margin partially covering the content was displayed on the left and right when rotating horizontally in iOS 14.0.1
- Change the permissions of txt and pdf files so that they do not switch directly from the default file app (to facilitate file management in the file app)
- Improved connection status maintenance in direct view

- Improved to display ePub files in the following file list
- Fixed bug related to swipe back

- Added option and function to manually/automatically change the next file list pop-up displayed automatically on the last page in settings
- Fixed reported crash

- Due to a change in Mega App's policy, a message notifying users to download first when sharing files in Mega App
- Added second option of "Single Tab (Previous Page)"
- Fixed a problem where the page could not be switched in certain functions after returning to the app after using the home screen or another app

- Added a button to switch scroll/paging at the top of the viewer screen
- Fixed a problem where part of the text was cut off when rotating horizontally on a notch design device

- Fixed a problem where the folder list was not visible and the app died in the file move/copy pop-up of the Mac app
- Added the ability to drag and drop files or folders in the Mac app
- Fixed an issue where the button was displayed and clickable when the cursor was placed on the loading popup in the Mac app
- App-only password option added, app/file/folder lock function is used regardless of the device's security settings

- Improved file transfer and copy folder list sorting
- Text/ePub content search case ignored (if the search word contains alphabets)
- Status bar background option: It is possible to prevent content from being displayed behind the status bar (iPhone only, iOS14+)
- txt/ePub letter spacing option added (left and right spacing between letters, iOS 12+)

- Improved word wrap option
- Fixed a symptom that the loading time in some files increases significantly when setting tracking

- Text writing direction function/option support: Function for language reading in the left direction (iOS 14+)
- TTS pitch function/option added
- Improved file loading speed when word line wrapping is active (txt/ePub)

- Added unused option to Bluetooth custom key
- "Both direction-fixed" option added
- If file deletion fails, additional message and error code are displayed
- Information display options and functions at the bottom (iOS 14+, In-app purchase required)
- Cache related improvements and fixes
- Error correction after speed change during automatic scrolling
- Fixed a symptom that the background of the status bar and the background of the lower information were displayed transparently (some devices)

- Fixed a problem where the app dies when connecting to some FTP servers
- External keyboard key setting The key to be entered is displayed at the top of the screen so that some joysticks or gamepads can help with key setting. (iOS14+)

- iCloud File Sync: Please enable the function in Settings (iOS14+)
- After reading a file, close it or switch to the next file to synchronize (upload). (If enabled in settings)

- 게임 컨트롤러 입력 지원 (iOS14+, 인앱구매 또는 리워드 필요)
- 기기의 저장공간 "문서 및 데이터" 사용량 이슈 개선
- 일부 기기에서 업데이트 후에 실행이 되지 않는 증상 긴급 수정

- Improved symptom of switching to the main screen when switching to the previous screen (iOS14+)
- File/folder move/copy path selection screen added
- Fixed a problem where a large amount of space remained in "Documents and Data" in the device storage space even after deleting all files

- "마지막 페이지 팝업" 옵션 기본값 "수동" (첫 설치 유저, 기존 유저는 설정에서 수동으로 변경필요)
- 메인화면에서 폴더 없어도 복사/이동 화면 표시
- 광고 음소거 적용
- 기타 기능 개선
- Cache file related fixes

- TTS 제어 기능 및 옵션(재생/멈춤) : TTS 제어 옵션을 활성화 하면 일부 기능은 자동으로 비활성 됩니다.
- 파일 크기 표시 오류 수정
- 기타 버그 수정 및 기능 개선

- App tracking permission pop-up display (iOS 14+)
- Fixed reported crash

- 마지막 페이지 팝업에서 발생할 수 있는 충돌관련 코드 수정
- 기타 보고된 충돌 수정
